reversed -- inappropriate for the lead in this article if in fact it is verifiable
remnoving tag, the Larry Kramer claims are attributed to Larry Kramers. There is nothing weaselish there

restored two deleted sentences and provide appropriate footnotes
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ Most of the tweaking is an improvement, however this line is unsourced and OR-ish, as well as the previously present line before

Ach! I must not be thinking again. Proper afd tag this time.
nominated for deletion: see [[Wikipedia:Articles for deletion/Sexuality of Abraham Lincoln]]
/* Historical scholarship */ reformatted footnote from my previos addition

/* Historical scholarship */ expanded the content of the quote from Burlingame

added criticism of Kramer's alleged documents
removed word "other" -- Tripp has written an analysis of one aspect of Lincoln's life but has not written a biography
Add balance to intro by detailing marriage and children
reorganize images to make NPOV. Previous image alignment gives impression that most think Abe was straight

Hmm, bad citation, this is not the book, but a review *of* the book
removed inappropriate parenthetical comment. This could possibly be appropriate in CA Tripps own article but it is not appropriate for this
/* Historical scholarship */ restructure - having kids doesn't rule out bisexuality
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ Improve citation
/* Historical scholarship */ link lavender for context
/* Historical scholarship */ nine years (from 1926 to 1935) is not "decades" my dear
/* Lincoln's youth */ LOC is the publisher, improve citation

[[WP:AWB/T|Typo fixing]], Typos fixed: rather then â rather than, using [[Project:AWB|AWB]]
/* Historical scholarship */ This statement is a lot of bluster, the article ref'd does not use the word "incompetent" whatsoever
Depression section seems out of place. Moving into the Speed section since his leaving plays a central role
I agree about the copy vio. Moving mention of the poem and fleshed out the context in a different section
/* Lincoln's poem */ remove poem, if the source is the Tripp book, wouldn't it be a copyvio to reproduce it here? If not, what is the real source?
removed "encyclopedic" ad homenium. Also removed unsourced OR "all Lincoln biographers"

/* Historical scholarship */ Re-inserting Kramer paragraph. The existance Kramer's claim is sourced and that is the point. Feel free to insert a reliable source about expert's scepticism of the claim.
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ Avoid phrase "shared a bed" which one editor claims is "21st-century shorthand for sex," although I don't happen to believe it is
/* Historical scholarship */ too much certainty claimed
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ even a small one
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ large double
keep point & counterpoint together - absurd & foolish to remove central fact to issue
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ having a roommate was common then and now; "sharing a bed" is 21st century shorthand for sex and this innuendo cannot be allowed
we're not supposed to link bookstores here, use [[WP:ISBN|ISBN]]
Kramer claim is not accepted by any expert and Kramer has never shown copies of the secret letters to anyone
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ NYT BR
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ 4 in same room
/* External links */ contains significant source material
streak of lavender = sissy or effeminate, not homosexual
Reverted edits by [[Special:Contributions/24.168.89.243|24.168.89.243]] to last version by Proabivouac
[[WP:AES|â]]Replaced page with 'please give me information on abraham lincoln, i cant find anything on this machine!'
rm original argument - this article needs help
adding a fact tag to what may be OR
rv. Discussion about Lincoln's sexuality is obviously in dispute. That is what this article is about. The article is not about Lincoln being gay. The term sexuality is far more encompassing then that
tweaking intro. Lincoln as a gay man is not a topic of dispute, the suggestion is the topic of dispute.
/* Historical scholarship */ I read the article, it does not support this characterization
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ Needs a citation
/* Historical scholarship */ fixed wording to read in past tense (citing the year 1999)
/* Historical scholarship */ adding ref for Kramer claim. Also noting the year that Kramer made his claim
adding note of Donald's interpretation of the Tish comment
fixing ref link on Donald book
/* Relationship with David Derickson */ removing Wiki link on Derickson. I don't think he'll ever be notable enough for his own article
removing tag that was place prior to revision. If this is still "totally disputed" then I encourage editors to work on add & correcting sources
/* External links */ remove POV link description
adding book cover of Donald's book and moving other photos around
/* Historical scholarship */ adding Tripp book cover
/* Depression */ This entire section is rather poorly sourced and attributed. I pared down some of the most glaring POV and ORish tones. But overall this needs a complete rewrite
/* Relationship with David Derickson */ OR clean up
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ removed unneeded quote. also removed unsource comment. Some text rearranging
/* Relationships with women */ removed unsourced comment and some NPOV rewording
/* Lincoln's poem */ adding ref for poem
Moving historical interpretation part up since it establishes what the article is about, rather then make it a Gay or Not question. Substantial POV edits and removal of unsource content
/* Historical interpretation */ moved tag up who am I kidding the whole section is biased
/* Relationship with David Derickson */ adding secondary source & ref to Derickson & Lincoln arrangement
since we're really talking about the definition of a word here
closing up newline breaks in quote
Fully endorsing the dispute and tagging, there are serious POV problems here.
rv I can't let it stand, as it's not the actual state of the case
I have taken this to the talk page. Last revert.
I'm afraid that it's not neutral, and many of the facts are disputed. Therefore, reverting.
tag is ridiculous, if you're going to be ridiculous noone is going to care about your opinion
actually, it's not even a neutral tone... adding {{totallydisputed}}
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ extend cite
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ hrmmm fix dashes
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ cite authors
/* Relationship with Joshua Speed */ add long quote to illustrate nature of relationship
/* External links */ add sources for future reference on sexuality and speed
Tagging article. Starting [[WP:RFC]] to clean up article.
on second thought, just revert, these edits are not in accord with known facts
this statement appears to be editorial opinion specifically to predujice the reader unfairly
changed number of men to at least two
reworded opening and changed the word around his relationship with mary todd. Way it was worded made it sound as if he had beaten her.
/* Relationships with women */ typo betwee to between
/* Historical interpretation */ link to [[C. A. Tripp]]'s stub. what's the source that he was a protege of Kinsey?
/* Lincoln's poem */ source is not given for poem, assuming it's probably Tripp's essay since most of this article duplicates his theory
/* Lincoln's poem */ OR "interpretation" of the poem
/* Relationships with women */ Further clean with some uncited OR, especially the weasel wordish claim of Mary Todd being psychopathic. This would need a source
/* Relationships with women */ OR clean ''To be generous.." is to input original sentiment and thought
weasel word removal. If we are going to have gay activist claiming him gay/bi we need names and sources. The same with the claim of "most historians" rejecting
if Chesson/Baker "supports" the thesis, provide quotes from Chesson/Baker
/* External links */ Re-add Dr. Hatheway article. He has written about homosexuality in the past, (ISBN 0312234929) and is a Ph D historian.
rv and take to talk page
/* External links */ these are published sources used in preparing article and need listing here
/* External links */ moving former refs to external links and current ref out, these do have a place, but they are not being cited correctly
restore ref, the paragraph does alraedy agree
further POV, really, this isn't helping, you're not even citing refs properly
You must provide your reasons on the talk pages to use such a tag, Causesobad. It is quite clear you're just trying to force your own POV.
moderate claims and drop speculation based on secret sources (Kramer) -- not encyclopedic
Do you understand what neutrality means? Don't make foolish edit to this page until you thoroughly grasp the information.
cut tag, reasons must actually be given
/* References and footnotes */ summarize the Hatheway book review
And that is still a horribly weasel-worded intro, find a way for it to not appear as if you have an axe to grind
that he may be lying does not matter, the paragraph only adresses the fact that he has a POV, and at least fix your mistakes
reject oddball who claims he has secret letters but refuses to show them--this is encyclopedia not supermarket tabloid
Wiki demands we use the best and moast reliable sources and reject junk--like a person who says he "discovered" new letters but will not show them to anyone
Using a single ref to front your own view is still POV
add cites and drop POV speculation
/* Lincoln's poem */ Stupid speculation bases on stupid book!
